title: Sketchbook Folio, "St. George, Detail from a Polytich with Virgin Enthroned, Study after Dosso Dossi", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white heavy wove paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: St. George standing with his body seen in profile, gazing out of picture towards spectator, over left shoulder; at his feet, dragon. Draperies billow at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "St. George, Detail from a Polytich with Virgin Enthroned, Study after Dosso Dossi", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3615.
